summary:
"I... smell... WEAKNESS." - badass Dremora
A minimalist mod that gives the highest level conjurer enemies (ARCH conjurers) the ability to summon Dremora Lords in addition to the usual lesser daedra. Does not affect other types of mage enemies like necromancers or elemental mages, ONLY conjurers.
descriptionHtml:
Highest level conjurer enemies (ARCH conjurers) are now able to summon Dremora Lords in addition to the usual lesser daedra. Does not affect other types of mage enemies like necromancers or elemental mages, ONLY conjurers.

Note: Arch Conjurers usually appear when the player is level 46 or more, located mainly in dungeons and forts alongside other mage type enemies.

To install, place the .esp file into the game's DATA directory. Don't forget to enable it in the launcher or mod manager.


Adapted the Conjure Dremora Lord spell for NPC use and placed it into the highest level conjurer template.

Mod's technical details:
NPC_ EncWarlock07TemplateConjurer (modified original leveled list)
SPEL ConjureDremoraLordRightHand (new form)

These are the only changes I made, if another mod uses the "EncWarlock07TemplateConjurer" leleved list it will conflict with my mod.
author: defunkt
